alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hydrologic Outlook issued July 05 at 12:43PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...Rises on the Chilkat River by Friday... A heat wave will cause temperatures to soar into the mid 70s and 80s starting Thursday and continue through Sunday. Warmest temperatures are expected Friday with a greater than 85% chance for temperatures greater than 75 degrees. With these warm temperatures, ice and snow melt at elevation will increase runoff into the Chilkat River Basin. In these very warm weather situations the Chilkat River can rise 1 foot each day. There is increased confidence that the Chilkat River will be near 125.5 feet by Friday morning with potentially rising more by Saturday morning with water starting to encroach into yards in Klukwan. Check back for updates on this event going into the weekend.
